mapper.select: SELECT pdp.d_plan_code, pdp.plan_code, pdp.prod_code, pdp.d_plan_count, pdp.d_plan_start_date, pdp.d_plan_end_date, pdp.d_plan_priority, pdp.d_plan_note, MAX(oddl.dlvy_date) AS dlvy_date, MAX(pl.prod_count) AS prod_count FROM prod_d_plan pdp LEFT JOIN prod_plan pp ON pdp.plan_code = pp.plan_code LEFT JOIN ord_list ol ON pp.ord_code = ol.ord_code LEFT JOIN ord_d_list oddl ON ol.ord_code = oddl.ord_code LEFT JOIN prod_lot pl ON pdp.prod_code = pl.prod_code where pdp.plan_code = #{planCode} GROUP BY pdp.d_plan_code, pdp.plan_code, pdp.prod_code, pdp.d_plan_count, pdp.d_plan_start_date, pdp.d_plan_end_date, pdp.d_plan_priority, pdp.d_plan_note
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_plan(ord_code, plan_title, plan_person, plan_date) VALUES(#{ordCode},#{planTitle},#{planPerson},#{planDate})

INSERT INTO prod_d_plan(plan_code, prod_code, d_plan_count, d_plan_start_date, d_plan_end_date, d_plan_priority, d_plan_note) VALUES(#{planCode},#{prodCode},#{dplanCount},#{dPlanStartDate},#{dPlanEndDate},#{dPlanPriority},#{dPlanNote})
